products.title: Splash Vine Green Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash vine green roller blind in green. Made to measure from 9.35 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their moisture-resistant splash vine green roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The lush green roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade.
Roller blinds add a really modern feel to any space and at swift direct blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2050 fabric colour: vine green material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.metadescription: Splash pear green roller blind in green. Made to measure from 9.35 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash pear green is a lush green roller blind that will add a sleek finish to your interior styling.This light-filtering, dim-out roller blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. We think this shade looks beautiful when paired with rich wooden tones within the home or as a statement shade with nuetrals.

products.title: Splash Moss Green Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash moss green roller blind in green. Made to measure from 9.35 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash moss green is a beautiful colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder great for injecting colour into any room. Their splash moss green roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.
